gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 126, Thunder 112
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Thunder, 126-112. Pascal Siakam led the way for the Pacers with 21 points and five rebounds, while Tyrese Haliburton added eight points and 11 assists in the victory. Luguentz Dort tallied a game-high 22 points for the Thunder in the losing effort. The Pacers improve to 44-34 on the season, while the Thunder fall to 52-25.
